$AMC will survive no matter (and BK will not happen, that is confirmed) - but I prefer $EPR which is really  the third American theatre stock that nobody mentions.

messages.body:
$EPR 

Movie theaters need “a bridge” to get to 2021, when a coronavirus vaccine is expected to be ready, or else the industry “might not survive” the pandemic, according to the National Association of Theater Owners (NATO).

https://finance.yahoo.com/news/theaters-need-a-bridge-to-2021-or-else-might-not-survive-pandemic-movie-association-003329089.html

links.title: Theaters need a 'bridge' to 2021 or else 'might not survive' COVID-19: Movie association
links.description: Movie theaters need "a bridge" to get to 2021, when a coronavirus vaccine is expected to be ready, or else the industry "might not survive" the pandemic, according to the National Association of Theater Owners (NATO).

messages.body:
$EPR Ignore the long winded troll.  
 
With regards to the vaccine, it's being ramped up at risk right now (with the US bankrolling a lot of it to be first in the line). All publicly accepted authorities on this subject including Fauci, the CDC director and the CEOs predict April for the start of mass public availability and a return to normality by 3Q 21. And they're conservative or pessimistic as a habit.  
 
Again, It's not going to take 18 months from April for it to roll out. I'm sure no one is taking him seriously, but just in case.
$EPR lets gooooo babyyyyyyy!!!! 💸
$EPR if you look at the candlesticks on the weekly timeframe, closing at these levels would set up for a strong reversal to the upside.

$DELL $M $EPR $IYR discord dark pool Equity buy/sells can be checked on the daily chart 1 minute candle. Check the time with eastern market time +1 minute. In most cases the order will stand out and are easy to spot as a large red or green candle. Orders print day before or same day so both need to be checked

messages.body:
$EPR This is among my worst 2019-2020 positions - took losses on most of it a few months back when it got in the 30s; had made a good return buying it in the teen during the crash in March.

Still holding in my IRA 
I notice some optimism for a rebound - I know their balance sheet is solid...

Do I stay or do I go?

$EPR “N.F.L. Postpones Steelers-Titans Game After New Covid-19 Positive”

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/30/sports/football/nfl-postpones-titans-steelers-covid-19.html?referringSource=articleShare

links.title: N.F.L. Postpones Steelers-Titans Game After New Covid-19 Positive
links.description: With the Tennessee Titans roiled by a coronavirus outbreak that has infected multiple players and team personnel, the N.F.L. has rescheduled their game on Sunday against the Pittsburgh Steelers to either Monday or Tuesday. It is the first N.F.L. game to be pushed back because of Covid-19.
